abstract: Opening arguments in trial of Boston Marathon bombing defendant Dzhokhar Tsarnaev are set to begin shortly.
lead_paragraph: Opening arguments in the Boston Marathon bombings trial are set to begin Wednesday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Opening Is Set in Boston Marathon Bombings Trial
